messages.title: Our Country Needs A Strong Opposition
messages.content: Fighting against Hard Brexit, Standing up for the NHS, Opposing school cuts

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats have always fought for Britain’s membership of the European Union, and are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
We need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give it the funds it needs.
Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in our area. Schools in Nottingham are set to lose more than £26 million from their budgets.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain’s membership of the European Union.
issues.education: Opposing school cuts, Schools in Nottingham are set to lose more than £26 million from their budgets.
issues.health: We need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give it the funds it needs.

community.content: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in our area.

leaflet.personalStatement: Tad Jones is the Liberal Democrats’ candidate for Nottingham North. Tad is committed to being your strong voice in Parliament, fighting against hard Brexit, standing up for the NHS, and opposing school cuts.

images.caption: Change the direction of the country on Thursday June 8th 2017
